column1: #Text=Synthesis of a Hollow Nanotube for Drug Delivery
#Text=[0406] Silicon nanowires are synthesized using the VLS technique.
#Text=Oriented or unoriented nanowires may be synthesized depending on conditions.
#Text=The outer shell of the wires may be converted to silicon oxide by high temperature thermal processing.
#Text=Alternatively, silicon oxide may be deposited on the wires at low temperatures using PECVD.
#Text=The core silicon can then be etched away in the gas phase using, for example XeF.sub.2.
#Text=Tubes of different compositions may be made using this process as a mold.
#Text=Synthesis of a High Surface Area Contact Electrical Contact
